hints_html: A special number occurs in the numerator that makes this problem easy.
hints_latex: A special number occurs in the numerator that makes this problem easy.
hints_raw: A special number occurs in the numerator that makes this problem easy.
question: 2 (a) ii
statement_html:
For each of the following congruences, find the least nonnegative integer x that satisfies it.

\(\displaystyle \frac{59!}{30!} \equiv x \mod{31}\)
statement_raw:
'''For each of the following congruences, find the least nonnegative integer ''x'' that satisfies it.'''

<math> \displaystyle \frac{59!}{30!} \equiv x \mod{31}</math>
